title: Weather Trips
imgDescription: A mapped route of your trip with weather cards next to it for each stop along the way based on when you will get there according to google travel times and 1hr per stop.

title: Bill Board Budget
imgDescription: Bill Board is a budgeting app with suggested amounts for categories based on your current income.

title: Brotein
imgDescription: Track your workouts and meals, and find recipies based on specific foods or youtube workout videos.

title: Macro Automation Videos
imgDescription: Videos showing how many macros I've made for Lazer Designs work.

title: Employee Directory
imgDescription: List of employees info that can be organized by any column and a search bar to trim the list.

title: Workout Tracker
imgDescription: Add your workouts and see Charts and graphs about the workouts.

title: Work Day Planner
imgDescription: A work day with scheduled tasks broken up by hour color coded to show what has passed, where we are and what is to come.

title: Weather Dashboard
imgDescription: Weather cards for specified cities with weather icons showing the weather and listed info
